alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 2:21PM CST until January 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to around 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Cook County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Additionally, wind chills as low as 25 to 30 degrees below zero are expected tonight into Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
